title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library that wraps the Ollama REST API for chatting, generating embeddings and pulling models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that lets you plug any Ollama model into chains, agents and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI (React/Flask) that talks to a local Ollama instance; supports multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, conversation history and model switching.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation example using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs, streaming and embedding support.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models through slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim wrapper for the Ollama REST API with native Nim types and async HTTP client.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate offering strongly-typed requests/responses and streaming support via Tokio.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with dependency injection helpers and Blazor chat sample.

title: ollama-models
summary: Curated collection of Modelfile recipes for community-tuned LLMs and multimodal variants.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for chatting with local models in any channel.

title: ollama-rss
summary: Lightweight service that polls RSS feeds and generates daily summaries using Ollama models.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI built in Tauri (Rust+React) for managing and chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration that enables Ollama models as generators and embedders in Haystack pipelines.
